      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied from the CD obtained from Washington, DC 2005

The school boundaries were heads-up digitized from paper maps supplied by the D.C. public schools and the 1995 orthos.  They do not include private or charter schools.  Maps were created in the fall of 2000 and reviewed by D.C. Public Schools.  The planning and facilities group of the DC Public Schools updated the existing attendance boundaries using the base map and enrollee locations as a base in 2004.

Although these boundaries generally follow existing snap base features, the digitized boundaries are not identical to those base features.  Differences are not significant at scales fitting a letter-sized page, but differences may become apparent when zoomed in further.  Given this, these boundaries are not coincident with geography from other DC GIS datasets.  Staff used a 1m tolerance to clean up gaps and overshoots in the polygons.

All DC GIS data is stored and exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters.</procdesc>
        <procdate>Unknown</procdate>
